pr_title: CB-8904 Check CM version when filtering images for upgrade

timeline.bodyText: The name should indicate that it doesn't check the CDH parcel.
timeline.author: keyki

timeline.message:
CB-8904 Check CM version when filtering images for upgrade

Upgrade with lock components hasn't filtered images by Cloudera Manager build number.
In this commit an additional check has been added. Also the filtering for CM and stack
version has been refactored into smaller classes.
